column4: I'm having the same issue as described in this bug: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux-source-2.6.22/+bug/118580 - There has already been a response posted - does this mean in the next kernel release these modules will be present/enabled?
Only if you are running 2.6.22, which right now is only in Gutsy
hrmm. I'm not no. I'm running feisty. Would it be possible to somehow enable this module on feisty?
I think it would require compiling your own kernel, but I'm not sure.
